Portal 2:
Como su antecesor, este titulo se basa en completar puzzles pero con la diferencia de que todo esta destruido y lleva consigo nuevas mecanicas y nuevos secretos que deberas ir descubriendo a lo largo del camino.

HISTORIA: Chell despierta en un cuarto de un hotel en el que conoceremos a Wheatley, un m√≥dulo de personalidad, que llevara a nuestra protagonista a las antiguas camaras de prueba del primer titulo. Wheatley accidentalmente revive a GLaDOS y vota al vacio a Chell. Una vez que Chell despierte, tendr√° que aventurarse en las antiguas instalaciones y buscar alguna salida

GR√ÅFICOS: No se ve nada mal, gr√°ficos medianamente buenos, detalles bien hechos pero claro, no olvidemos que este juego fue hecho con el motor source (2011)

JUGABILIDAD: Tendras una buena experiencia ya que ahora hay mas objetos para interactuar y mas pruebas para poner a prueba tu inteligencia

COMUNIDAD: No he jugado portal 2 hace un tiempo y no se realemnte si la comunidad se sigue manteniendo activa, algo que no me gusta es que en el modo "Busqueda de Compa√±ero en linea"
No encuentras a casi nadie disponible y es una pena, porque son niveles en la que tendras que coperar, la ultima vez jugue con un ni√±o ruso ._.

En conclusi√≥n mas jugabilidad, mas acertijos mas puzzles y por supuesto mas diversi√≥n.

Let me start out by saying that I have played this game a LOT across multiple different platforms. No matter where I play it, it is by all standards an amazing game. The levels in both the single and co-op experiences are very well thought out, and each level brings with it a new challenge, or new element that has to be solved. If you are into puzzles or critical thinking even a little bit, I highly recommend this game to you.

This game is amazing. Simply amazing. At the beginning, you are treated to an outstanding part where you are apparently in a nuclear meltdown. The puzzles are so hard, I had to look up tutorials to get through them at all! But, that's neccessarily a bad thing. Overall, I definitely reccomend this game!

Portal 2 is everything Portal was and more. With a longer, fleshed-out story, and a full co-op mode, Portal 2 has earned it's place as one of the best games of all time.
An absolute must play; one of the few classics who's refresh turned out amazing!

If you love crazy things like jumping to flying or boucing like a madman/woman then this game is for you. But beware some puzzles here might be confusing but don't worry once you figure it out it will be so much fun. But if you are very stuck you are allowed to watch a walkthough to get through. But if you can do them on your own that is fine too. Play and just go and have crazy amouts of fun.
